name: Ghassan Karame
content: Prof. Dr. Ghassan Karame - Homepage Prof. Dr. Ghassan Karame (PGP Key) Home Publications Teaching Service Talks Patents About me Since November 2021, I am a full Professor of Computer Science at the Ruhr-University Bochum (RUB) - leading the Chair for Information Security. I am a Principal Investigator (PI) in the Cluster of Excellence CASA (Cyber Security in the Age of Large-Scale Adversaries) and,  since October 2023, the Director (and a PI) at the Horst Goertz Institute for IT Security (HGI). I am also involved as a (part-time) Chief Scientific Advisor at NEC Laboratories Europe. Before joining RUB, I was working as an NEC Fellow and was leading the Security research group at NEC Labs in Germany.  An outdated summary of my research at NEC Labs is highlighted in this interview. Prior to joining NEC Labs, I was working as a postdoctoral researcher in the Institute of Information Security of ETH Zurich, Switzerland. Since 2011, I hold a PhD degree in Computer Science from ETH Zurich. I am interested in all aspects of security and privacy with a focus on decentralized security, and distributed machine learning security. My full list of publications is available here (by date) and here (by topic). Besides my research, I contributed to more than 100 currently granted patents in the US and the EU. My full list of granted patents can be found here. Here, you can find my Book on Bitcoin and Blockchain Security published in 2016. Selected media reports and interviews covering some of my past research can be found here: [Link1] [Link2] [Link3] [Link4] [Link5]. You can also follow/contact me on the following networks: Open Positions I am always looking for motivated PhD students and postdoctoral researchers in the area of system & information security, particularly (but not limited to) those interested/specialiating in decentralized security and privacy, distributed machine learning security, federated learning security, distributed platforms security. If you are interested in working with me, please send me an email with your current CV and a description of why you think you are a good fit.
